name: BouncingGame_HH
description:
This is DEMO file made by HH.

The way to play this game is as below: 

1. You can use arrow key to move a ball

2. You can jump with using a space key 

3. You can go the next stage after getting all items

4. You will get restared when you fall down 

Thank you for playing the game.  Hope you enjoy much.
